revised_title: Anomalous Vapour-Densities of Hydrated Diamines and Ethylene-Diamine Derivatives
tldr: The author investigates the anomalous vapour-densities of hydrated diamines and ethylene-diamine derivatives. They discover that the molecules of diethyl-ethylenediamine correspond to 2 volumes of vapour and propose an experimental solution to the question of anomalous densities.
